email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope this email finds you well. I’m reaching out regarding your inquiry for a crude oil shipment from Houston to Rotterdam. We have a suitable vessel, the MV Ocean Star, available for a laycan of October 20-25. The vessel has a DWT of 150,000 and an LOA of 280 meters. The starting freight rate is in the low 50s, say $50.75 per metric ton. Let me know if this works for you or if you’d like to discuss further. Best regards, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the quick response. The laycan works for us, but the freight rate is a bit on the higher side. Given the current market, we were hoping for something closer to $49.50 per metric ton. Also, could you confirm the demurrage rate? Looking forward to your reply. Cheers, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, thanks for your feedback. I understand your position on the freight rate. After discussing with the owner, we can offer $50.00 per metric ton, which is a competitive rate given the vessel’s specifications. The demurrage rate is $20,000 per day, pro rata. Let me know if this works for you. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the revised offer. We can agree to $50.00 per metric ton, provided the laycan remains firm at October 20-25. The demurrage rate is acceptable. Please send over the recap for review, and we’ll proceed with the fixture. Best, John

email_chain.subject: Recap: Crude Oil Shipment - MV Ocean Star
email_chain.body: Hi John, as discussed, please find below the recap for the crude oil shipment: Vessel: MV Ocean Star, DWT: 150,000, LOA: 280m. Load Port: Houston, Discharge Port: Rotterdam. Laycan: October 20-25. Freight Rate: $50.00 per metric ton. Demurrage: $20,000 per day, pro rata. Cargo Size: 140,000 metric tons. Please confirm if everything is in order. Best regards, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Recap: Crude Oil Shipment - MV Ocean Star
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, the recap looks good. We confirm the fixture. Please proceed with the necessary paperwork. Thanks for your assistance, and let’s stay in touch for future shipments. Cheers, John
